name: First Try (LumiSlo)
description:
--DISCLAIMER:  the  overall theme, narration of the game can be depressing or induce negative thoughts, deals with suicidal temptation and hints at abuse.--

As a lone runaway from home, explore the nearby areas in search for better outcomes. Wander the surreal landscape where you never know what to expect or where the boundaries of reality, your imagination or the supernatural might overlap.

My first game made with Twine, hence the name.  Purely made for self entertainment at first but if anyone enjoys it or finds it interesting you are welcome to join in.

Complete with 25 different endings, including a secret and the true ending.
